frontmatter.author: Erika Funa
frontmatter.title: Orange put on its painter's hat for an image analytics workshop in Austria
frontmatter.shortExcerpt = \"Teaching scenario: showing secondary school students how to train the computer to distinguish between the paintings of the artists Monet and Manet."
frontmatter.longExcerpt = \"Teaching scenario: showing secondary school students how to train the computer to distinguish between the paintings of the artists Monet and Manet. We were invited by the Consulate General of the Republic of Slovenia in Klagenfurt to a bilingual school in Austria, where we showcased how to teach with a pich of AI."
